title: Minecraft Java版 18w19a 发布
author: 玄素
txt_content:
本帖最后由 玄素 于 2018-5-9 13:02 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。  然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。 Minecraft 1.13 仍未发布，18w19a为其第33个预览版。 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。 
MINECRAFT SNAPSHOT 18W19AA Minecraft Java Edition snapshotJava版1.13快照 18W19A
We're getting ready to do pre-releases soon and we're working hard to fix bugs.我们已准备好尽快完成预发布版，而且我们也在超努力地修复漏洞。
CHANGES IN 18W19A18W19A变更列表Due to changes in world generation, worlds from previous snapshots will no longer work由于新的世界生成机制，之前快照中生成的世界将不再可用All undead mobs now sink所有的亡灵生物现在都会沉入水中Skeleton Horses are rideable underwater骷髅马可在水下骑乘Updated biomes to have new fancy names更新了群系的名字，现在变的更好听了Seagrass now generates in underwater caves海草现在生成于水下洞穴中New sounds for Conduit and Beacon信标和海潮核心有了新的音效Phantoms are now extra flappy幻翼现在更加轻盈Improved the upgrade paths from old versions改进了旧版本的升级路径You can now copy the output of the /seed command现在可直接复制/seed命令的输出内容Updated the credits list更新了制作者名单Maybe some other stuff?也许还有些别的特性？Fixed a couple of bugs修复了一吨错误
FIXED BUGS IN 18W19A18W19A漏洞修复MC-7908 - Spawning underwater / In the middle of an (lava) ocean修复：出生点位于水下/(熔岩)海中MC-86016 - Some Mojang staff not mentioned in credits.txt修复：部分Mojang员工未在credits.txt中提及MC-121285 - Crash on start when resolution is changed in profile修复：在配置中修改分辨率后在启动时崩溃MC-121636 - Server commands available in singleplayer with weird/bad effects修复：服务器命令于单人模式中有效，且会造成奇怪的效果MC-121661 - Typing /help + unavailable command returns "unexpected error" message修复：输入/help+不可用命令名将会返回"unexpected error"信息MC-121799 - Cannot summon lightning bolt修复：无法生成闪电MC-121999 - Incorrect /help behavior for non-ops修复：/help对非op玩家具有错误行为MC-122557 - Setting the size parameter for the dust particle to 0 or very close to it crashes the game修复：将dust粒子的大小设置为(接近)为0的值将会使游戏崩溃MC-122596 - Command autocomplete overrides command history navigation修复：命令自动补全的行为将会覆盖命令历史记录MC-122628 - /help no longer has pages修复：/help命令未分页MC-122630 - /help no longer prefixes "/" to commands修复：/help命令中提及的命令未前缀"/"MC-122684 - Connected LAN players are able to kick/ban the server host修复：连接至局域网游戏的玩家可以kick/ban服务器主MC-123053 - Game crashes when using an item with a tag in the CanDestroy or CanPlaceOn NBT tag修复：在CanDestroy或CanPlaceOn NBT tag中使用方块标签将会使游戏崩溃MC-123606 - Server crash: Ticking entity 'java.lang.ClassCastException: ass cannot be cast to aui'修复：服务器崩溃：Ticking entity 'java.lang.ClassCastException: ass cannot be cast to aui'MC-123778 - Team color doesn't work in playerlist and sidebar before reconnecting修复：队伍颜色在玩家重连之前未作用于玩家列表和侧边栏MC-123813 - Team colors no longer show in json results修复：队伍颜色不在json结果中显示MC-123835 - Colored sidebar display slots are not visible修复：指定颜色队伍侧边栏不可见MC-123852 - Glowing effect doesn't change depending on team color修复：发光效果不会因为队伍颜色改变轮廓线颜色MC-123856 - Clicking [Intentional Game Design] on death screen doesn't open a link to MCPE-28723修复：点击死亡界面上的[Intentional Game Design]不会打开MCPE-28723的链接MC-124091 - Team color doesn't affect name above head修复：队伍颜色选项不影响玩家头顶的名字显示MC-124092 - Some team options don't work修复：部分队伍设置选项不工作MC-124098 - jeb_ sheep don't change color修复：命名为jeb_的羊不变色MC-124102 - Book signing shows the author name as string representation of the textcomponent修复：书本署名将作者名处的textcomponent误作普通文本处理MC-124147 - Zombie horses are invisible and replaced with regular zombies on reload修复：僵尸马不可见，并将在重载世界后被普通僵尸代替MC-124237 - Command syntax help doesn't clamp to the right chat line border修复：命令格式提示未对齐至聊天框边界MC-124560 - Server says "type help or ?" but ? is not a valid command anymore修复：服务器提示"type help or ?"但/?已不再为有效的命令MC-124633 - Feedback text for "/team option seeFriendlyInvisibles false" when seeFriendlyInvisibles is already disabled is wrong修复：命令"/team option seeFriendlyInvisibles false"在seeFriendlyInvisibles已为false时返回错误的文本MC-124720 - Cannot start server with GUI修复：无法开启GUI服务端MC-124750 - /particle acting strangely across dimensions修复：/particle命令表现怪异地同时显示粒子于所有维度MC-124889 - You cannot shift click smeltable items into a furnace修复：你无法将可烧炼物品通过shift单击转移至熔炉里MC-124895 - Trees generate side by side修复：树按排生成MC-124898 - Minerals tab in furnace recipe book displays apple item修复：烧炼配方书中的矿物页图标为苹果MC-124949 - Tree generating in village house and as part of field修复：树生成于村庄房间中或田地上MC-124956 - Furnace recipe book availability toggle has wrong tooltip ("Showing craftable")修复：烧炼配方书有错误的显示切换提示("显示可合成")MC-125060 - Furnace recipe book availability toggle has crafting table icon修复：烧炼配方书使用合成台图标作为显示切换按钮图标MC-125107 - Mineshafts don't generate support blocks when a block is above it修复：当有方块在支撑柱正上时，将不再在矿井支柱下补充生成方块MC-125115 - Command suggestions don't order numbers from least to greatest修复：命令提示并未按照数值从小到大排序MC-125130 - Selector auto-completion tooltips mixed up修复：选择器自动补全所显示的对应实体提示互相混杂MC-125174 - Ore pockets do not generate in superflat worlds修复：矿石组不在超平坦世界中生成MC-125232 - Phantoms attack players in peaceful mode修复：幻翼于和平模式仍旧攻击玩家MC-125258 - Preparing spawn area spams 0%修复：加载世界时控制台中仅显示Preparing spawn area spams 0%MC-125283 - Jungle Biomes are extremely cluttered修复：丛林群系中树木生成过于繁多与凌乱MC-125381 - Effects from the turtle master potion don't show amplifier修复：神龟药水的药水效果不显示等级MC-125442 - Extreme Lag in Jungle Biome修复：丛林群系中游戏大幅卡顿MC-125466 - Fishing drops don't come towards player修复：钓鱼的获得物不飞向玩家MC-125550 - Experience orbs don't float up in water修复：经验球不浮于水面MC-125607 - Going inside of bubble columns in spectator mode plays bubble column sound修复：在旁观者模式下进入气泡柱将会播放气泡柱音效MC-125675 - Two high sea grass placed on the ocean floor can replace ocean monument parts修复：两格高的海草将会替代海底遗迹的部分生成MC-125803 - NoGravity no longers works on items修复：NoGravity标签不于物品上工作MC-125872 - Superflat preset "the void" doesn't generate starting platform anymore修复：超平坦预设“虚空”不生成初始平台MC-125915 - Zombies can destroy turtle eggs through a full block and a half above the egg修复：僵尸可以在位于海龟蛋一格半以上的位置破坏海龟蛋MC-125946 - Phantoms can spawn inside/colliding with blocks修复：幻翼可以在方块内生成MC-125997 - Deep Frozen Ocean isn't frozen修复：深冻洋群系未被冰冻MC-126085 - Pufferfish attack invisible players and creative/spectator players修复：河豚会试图攻击隐身/创造模式/旁观者玩家MC-126086 - Salmon and tropical fish hitbox on land is wrongly positioned修复：陆地上的鲑鱼和热带鱼的碰撞箱定位错误MC-126139 - The fins of dying cod and some tropical fish show z-fighting修复：死亡时的鳕鱼/部分热带鱼的鱼鳍出现了z-fighting现象MC-126144 - Cods suffocate when touching a solid block from below修复：鳕鱼会在其下有固体方块时窒息MC-126178 - Can use the water (with fish) bucket to destroy kelp, sea grass, coral and coral fan修复：可用(含鱼的)水桶摧毁海带、海草、珊瑚和珊瑚扇方块MC-126190 - Salmon mobs often get stuck修复：鳕鱼常被卡住MC-126198 - Only players are poisoned by pufferfish修复：只有玩家才会被河豚中毒MC-126218 - Held turtle eggs are too low in first person修复：第一人称下手持的海龟蛋位置太低MC-126261 - Turtle Egg Placement修复：海龟蛋生成时的位置问题MC-126362 - Shift-clicking fuel into non-empty furnaces only moves fuel client-side修复：shift点击燃料充填入非空的熔炉将只会于客户端标记燃料移动MC-126380 - Getting an uncarved pumpkin gives recipe for jack o' lantern修复：获得未修剪过的南瓜将会解锁南瓜灯的配方MC-126656 - Bubble columns made by Soul Sand only appear every other block修复：灵魂沙生成的气泡柱仅间隔显示MC-126762 - Red screen when player attack invalid tropical fish variant修复：当玩家攻击无效的热带鱼变种时红屏MC-126800 - The tropical fish item is named "clownfish".修复：热带鱼物品被命名为“小丑鱼”MC-126815 - Banner and treasure markers on maps show incorrect icons in multiplayer修复：地域上的旗帜和宝藏标记在多人环境下显示错误MC-126859 - Polar bears and rabbits not spawning in Ice Plains修复：北极熊和兔子未在冰原中生成MC-126883 - Shulker(box) becomes dark purple when upgrading from 1.12.2修复：从1.12.2版本中更新的世界中潜影贝(盒)变为深紫色MC-126950 - Riding floating boats underwater修复：可以乘坐已沉没的船MC-127069 - huge phantom crash修复：巨型幻翼导致的崩溃MC-127166 - Parrots don't imitate dolphins, phantoms and drowneds修复：鹦鹉不会模仿海豚、幻翼和溺尸的声音MC-127253 - F3+Q list isn't sorted alphabetically anymore修复：F3+Q显示的列表未按字母序排列MC-127274 - F3+C to copy coordinates works even when reduced debug info is enabled修复：F3+C复制坐标的行为即便开启了简化调试信息仍旧有效MC-127291 - Zombies drowning always drop armor items instead of using random chance修复：溺变的僵尸总是而非随机地掉落其身着的盔甲物品MC-127295 - Zombies can gain tridents or fishing rods when they drown修复：僵尸在溺变时可能获得三叉戟或者鱼竿MC-127337 - F3+C (copy coordinates) does not copy dimension修复：F3+C复制坐标的行为不会复制维度信息MC-127388 - Pufferfish appear with their most inflated model after world load修复：河豚在世界重载后显示其最大体型MC-127516 - Duplication and deletion of ingredients, inventory desync and game freezing caused by faulty handling of firework star recipe修复：处理烟火之星配方的错误导致材料删除或复制，库存错误及游戏进程冻结MC-127593 - Waterlogged blocks such as fence sign ladder etc, will not allow bubble columns to spawn next to them修复：waterlogger状态的方块，例如栅栏、告示牌、梯子之类，将不会使气泡柱与其旁生成MC-127924 - Slow falling is considered a negative effect修复：缓降被视作负面效果MC-127969 - Sea grass doesn't generate correctly above stairs修复：海草在楼梯上方无法正确生成MC-127998 - You cannot place sea pickles on top of non solid blocks修复：你无法将海泡菜放在非固体方块之上MC-127999 - Glitching in sea pickles when standing on them while placing the fourth one in the block修复：站在海泡菜方块中并放置第四个海泡菜于该方块时的故障MC-128039 - New Phantom skins do not match spawning egg colors修复：新的幻翼材质与其刷怪蛋配色不匹配MC-128242 - Leaving water while swimming causes player's arm to render out of screen修复：在游泳动作下离开水中导致玩家的手臂显示于画面外MC-128243 - Dolphins do not try to get into the water修复：海豚不会试图进入水中MC-128264 - Mobs can spawn on regular ice修复：生物可于普通冰块上生成MC-128285 - Dolphins summoned with NoAI take damage and die修复：拥有NoAI标签的海豚将会受到伤害并死亡MC-128336 - Kelp spawns on trapdoors, stairs, slabs and chests on sunken ships修复：海带生成于沉船中的活板门、楼梯、台阶和箱子之上MC-128463 - The "How Did We Get Here" advancement does not require Conduit Power修复：进度“为什么会变成这样呢”不包含海潮能量效果MC-128557 - Drowning dolphins don't swim to the surface.修复：溺水的海豚不会游至水面MC-128666 - Flowing water above magma blocks turns into bubble columns修复：岩浆块上方的流动水方块变为气泡柱MC-128674 - Buffet end island puts you in the void修复：自定世界中选择模式为末地将会使你出生于虚空MC-128681 - Dolphins don't drop experience修复：海豚不会掉落经验MC-128712 - Phantoms don't drop experience when killed by player修复：幻翼在被玩家击杀时不会掉落经验MC-128733 - The ice block tag is missing frosted_ice修复：方块标签ice缺失方块frosted_iceMC-128766 - Blue ice doesn't mine fast using pickaxe修复：用镐子挖掘蓝冰并不会更快MC-128779 - "Debug Mode" comes before "Buffet" in the world creation menu修复：创建世界菜单里，“调试模式”在“自选”之前MC-128857 - Sea pickles change hitbox when increasing count, but turtle eggs don't修复：在增加该方块放置的此物品计数时，海泡菜正确改变了其碰撞箱，而海龟蛋没有

Please report any and all bugs you find in Minecraft to bugs.mojang.com. If nobody reports a bug, we can’t fix it! experimental development snapshots” and save. To switch to the normal version, you can select it in the dropdown at the bottom left corner of the launcher. Back up your world first or run the game on in a different folder (See the “new profile” dialog). Snapshots can corrupt your world, please backup and/or run them in a different folder from your main worlds. 请在http://bugs.mojang.com报告Minecraft中的BUG。如果没人汇报BUG的话，我们无法修复它！ 如果你想试玩快照，请打开官方启动器并点击“New Profile”按钮，选中“snapshots”并选择“Enable experimental development snapshots”并点击保存。如果想切换到普通的版本，你可以在启动器左下角按钮上方的下拉菜单中选择。在开始快照前备份你的世界或在不同的文件夹中启动快照（见“new profile”对话框）。 快照可能会玩坏你的存档，请千万记得备份存档和/或在与你的存档不同文件夹里运行。 服务器Jar：https://launcher.mojang.com/mc/game/18w19a/server/97ad982d...8b1901f6/server.jar  正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.jar 关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft 1.13（水域更新）特性列表 的更新。 预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要vpn。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验快照版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。  外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 Mojang官方博客（英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）

replies.author: Jecvay
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Jecvay 于 2018-5-9 01:43 编辑 

1.13快发布了耶

replies.author: H_X_930_
replies.txt_content: 刚刚更新了18W19A到海旁边奇卡无比，而且三叉戟，弓，盾都用不了，一直疯狂切换，难受死我了。

replies.author: megabits
replies.txt_content: 楼上说海边卡的问题我也遇到了。另外对这次 Mojang 直接干掉旧版本存档的做法表示非常不满。大半年白玩了。

replies.txt_content: 修复“僵尸转化成溺尸时自带三叉戟”是什么情况，不会只能去海里碰运气了吧....

buhuichongfu 发表于 2018-5-9 10:23
1、看这些bug，游戏的代码质量，一定是很……
2、版本号好像不连续？我错过什么了吗？ ...
18是年份，19是周数，19后面的abcd是当前周的第几个版本，好像是这样的

replies.txt_content: 更新后，镐子只能挖一下，挖完一块石头镐子就在手中鬼畜了，什么都挖不了了

replies.author: QWERTY_MOD
replies.txt_content: 不说别的，更新后盾牌、弓、斧子、剑、镐子等物品拿在手上直接鬼畜..啥都干不了.....

replies.author: comiee
replies.txt_content:
只有我一个启动失败？
[16:29:14.415] [Minecraft] 错误信息：[16:29:14] [Bootstrap 0/ERROR]: Unable to bootstrap datafixers
[16:29:14.415] [Minecraft] 错误信息：java.lang.StackOverflowError: null
